summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons administrative document dated July 30, 2019, updating the status of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It states he is being taken off psychological observation and suicide watch, and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate. The document appears as part of a chain of email or system notifications with read receipts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced in the administrative update regarding his removal from psychological observation and suicide watch status.

events.title: Epstein removed from suicide watch and psych observation
events.description: An administrative update indicates inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off psychological observation and suicide watch, and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate.

keyFacts: On July 30, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was officially taken off psychological observation and suicide watch while in federal custody.
The document directs that Epstein needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate following the change in his status.
The administrative note is part of a system showing multiple 'Read' and 'Response Pending' statuses, indicating it was part of an internal communication chain.
